name: Skill Issue (Eric Gurt)
description:
Skill Issues is a .io-kind of a game where you shoot rockets that make holes in a world.

This game will spawn AI players if there is nobody else on a server.

Game has a catch-up mechanic that makes good players receive more damage and deal less. Opposite works for less skilled players - they are more tanky.

W, S, A, D - move
Left mouse button - fire
